File /secure/simul_efun/sqrt.c

Cotains some simul_efuns.

Written by Pinkfish

Method index

sqrt(mixed)
This method attempts to find a square root of an input number.

Public Functions

These are functions that everyone can access.

.
sqrt
mixed sqrt(mixed number)
This method attempts to find a square root of an input number. This returns a square root in the same type as the input type.

Parameters:
Returns:
the square root
See also:
efun::sqrt()
